short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify a website's layout by dragging elements. Right click on an element to select it and all children, then drag it anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize changes to your website just by dragging elements around. When the extension is enabled (green icon) you just right click on the element you want to move. Once you see it highlighted with a blue box, you can drag it anywhere on the page. The extension selects all children of the element that is right-clicked.
